attributes.action: Ensure that local councils provide sperate waste collections to recycle plastic waste
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The main problem with recycling and 1 collection per fortnight of the main dustbin is the ammount of room taken up by plastic bottles etc.
Loacl councils should be providing seperate collection bins for this type of waste.
No doubt there are still people who choose to burn this kind of waste causing pollution to the environment.
